Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful

Interface DnDManager.DnDInterface

Enclosing class:
DnDManager
public static interface DnDManager.DnDInterface

This interface is a set of callbacks to support drag&drop operations in conjunction with DnDManager class. The lifecycle of the callbacks is:

  • getSourceContent(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int) calls at the beginning of the drag operation. If it returns non-null value, drag operation starts. Calls only once for each dedicated drag&drop operation
  • canReceive(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int, Class) calls on every mouse moving during drag&drop.
  • track(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int) calls on every mouse moving during drag&drop.
  • getSourceContent(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int) calls at the end of the drag operation, but before complete(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int, Object) method call. Calls only once for each dedicated drag&drop operation
  • complete(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int, Object) the same last call at the lifecycle. Calls only once for each dedicated drag&drop operation
Since:
0.0.4
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canReceive​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component from, int xFrom, int yFrom, java.awt.Component to, int xTo, int yTo, java.lang.Class<?> contentClass)

  • Method Details

    • getSourceContentClass

      java.lang.Class<?> getSourceContentClass​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component component, int x, int y)

      Get source content class. This method returns type of the content, located at requested point.

      Parameters:
      currentMode - current drag&drop mode. Can't be null
      component - current component. Can't be null
      x - current x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the component
      y - current y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the component
      Returns:
      content type to drag. Null cancels drag operation

    • getSourceContent

      java.lang.Object getSourceContent​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component from, int xFrom, int yFrom, java.awt.Component to, int xTo, int yTo)

      Get source content to pass it to complete(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int, Object) method.

      Parameters:
      currentMode - current drag&drop mode. Can't be null
      from - source component. Can't be null
      xFrom - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      yFrom - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      to - target component. Can't be null
      xTo - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      yTo - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      Returns:
      content to drag&drop. Null cancels drop operation

    • canReceive

      boolean canReceive​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component from, int xFrom, int yFrom, java.awt.Component to, int xTo, int yTo, java.lang.Class<?> contentClass)

      Test the control can receive dragged data.

      Parameters:
      currentMode - current drag&drop mode. Can't be null
      from - source component. Can't be null
      xFrom - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      yFrom - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      to - target component. Can't be null
      xTo - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      yTo - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      contentClass - class of the content dragged. Can't be null
      Returns:
      true if the content can be dropped to the given target control

    • track

      void track​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component from, int xFromAbsolute, int yFromAbsolute, java.awt.Component to, int xToAbsolute, int yToAbsolute)

      Track drag&drop operation. Can be used for visualization purposes.

      Parameters:
      currentMode - current drag&drop mode. Can't be null
      from - source component. Can't be null
      xFromAbsolute - staring x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the screen
      yFromAbsolute - staring y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the screen
      to - target component. Can't be null
      xToAbsolute - current x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the screen
      yToAbsolute - current y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the screen

    • complete

      void complete​(DnDManager.DnDMode currentMode, java.awt.Component from, int xFrom, int yFrom, java.awt.Component to, int xTo, int yTo, java.lang.Object content)

      Complete drop operation.

      Parameters:
      currentMode - current drag&drop mode. Can't be null
      from - source component. Can't be null
      xFrom - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      yFrom - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the source component
      to - target component. Can't be null
      xTo - x-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      yTo - y-coordinate related to upper-left corner of the target component
      content - content returned by getSourceContent(DnDMode, Component, int, int, Component, int, int) method
